text.section:
The Administration may:
charge an initial application fee of not more than $25 for support services;
deduct from the child support payment to defray the cost of providing support enforcement services under:
the Income Tax Refund Intercept Program under this subtitle; and
the Federal Treasury Offset Program; and
collect fees from the obligor to defray the costs of providing support enforcement services.

Except as provided in subsection (a) of this section, the Administration may not:
collect fees from the child support obligee; or
deduct fees from the child support payment.
